item.description:
*** This is NOT an official coven event but we thought it interesting enuff to make a field trip out of it***

From their website:
"The Witches of Salem are marching in this year's Haunted Happenings Grand Parade and would love you to march with us! Your children are welcome to march too!

WHEN: Please arrive at our contingent no later than 5:30 PM. Look for the black capes!

WHERE: The parade begins behind the SHETLAND PARK (see map). Parking is available onsite. Our section will be announced soon!

BRING: a plastic pumpkin basket of nut free candy to give out to the kids as this lots of them come to watch!

WEAR: your Witchy best! Capes and robes, striped socks and pointy hats are all encouraged! This year's theme is "World Animal Day" so we encourage you to add a symbol of your favorite animal totem as well!

INVITE: any of your friends who are close enough that they can make it!

We'll see you there!"

Please check their FB page for the most up=to-date info

http://www.facebook.com/events/263556823747402/
item.name: March with the Witches of Salem
